texts.0: I hope you are happy with your new job.
texts.3: I'm sorry, we currently have no openings for anyone with your profile
texts.day02_greeting:
Good day Mr. Zheng
How can I help you?
texts.day02_job_offers: Oh how nice. I can offer you a trainee position with the police. Alternatively, you can get a cashier job in the Super Store.
texts.day02_want_police: I would like to be a policeman.
texts.day02_pleased: We are pleased about that. Especially now after the introduction of Communityscore, we need exemplary citizens like you who can help their fellow citizens become better people.
texts.day02_need_money: Actually, I just need the money.
texts.day02_honor_answer:
We need people like you in this country.

Report to Chief Inspector Wang tomorrow at 10:00. He will explain everything else to you. The police station is located south of here.
texts.day02_money_answer:
If you serve our state faithfully, you will not have to worry about this.

Report to Chief Inspector Wang tomorrow at 10:00. He will explain everything else to you. The police station is located south of here.
